priority.title: Your Privacy is Our Priority
priority.content: At LegacyGuard, we understand that your personal and family information is incredibly sensitive. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our service.

accountInfo.title: Account Information:
accountInfo.description: Email address, name, and authentication data

documentData.title: Document Data:
documentData.description: Files and documents you upload (encrypted on your device)

usageData.title: Usage Data:
usageData.description: How you interact with our service to improve your experience

zeroKnowledgeArchitecture.title: Zero-Knowledge Architecture
zeroKnowledgeArchitecture.intro: LegacyGuard uses end-to-end encryption with a zero-knowledge architecture. This means:
points: Your documents are encrypted on your device before being uploaded
We cannot read, access, or decrypt your personal documents
Only you have the keys to decrypt your information
Even if compelled by law enforcement, we cannot provide your decrypted data

howWeUseInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
points: To provide and maintain our service
To send you important service notifications
To provide customer support when requested

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.intro: We implement industry-leading security measures including:
points: TLS encryption for all data transmission
Regular security audits and penetration testing
Secure data centers with physical and digital protections

yourRights.title: Your Rights
points: Delete your account and associated data
Export your data in a portable format

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@legacyguard.com
